[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/markdown](./markdown.md) &gt; [MarkdownModel](./markdown.markdownmodel.md)

## MarkdownModel class

Markdown viewer model that renders markdown files with terminal styling in a scrollable viewport.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class MarkdownModel 
```
